title: Coupon Code for YouTube Premium Users Offers $100 Off the Pixel 9
description: As a little treat, some YouTube Premium subscribers are getting the chance to get a Pixel 9 for even less.
author: Ayomide Sadiq
excerpt: As a little treat, some YouTube Premium subscribers are getting the chance to get a Pixel 9 for even less.
text: Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more. The Google Pixel 9 is almost five months old, but it is hardly old news as it remains the latest and greatest smartphone series from Google. If you're looking for a premium build, fantastic software, and some of the best cameras in the Android sector, you can essentially never go wrong with a Pixel. At the moment, the entire Pixel 9 series is being discounted, giving you the chance to get any of the phones cheaper than usual. However, if you're a YouTube Premium subscriber in the US, you might want to check your inbox, as you might have the chance to get it for even less. That's not something to say not to if you're open to a new device. The Google Pixel 9 Series Is Currently Being Discounted as Much as $300 on the US Google Store Image: Google The Google Pixel 9 devices are heading to be five months old, after their launch on August 22nd last year. The devices are still excellent, from the vanilla-flavored Pixel 9 all the way to the expensive and redesigned Pixel 9 Pro Fold. I'm not quite a Pixel person anymore, but if you are, I can't blame you, especially if you find yourself in love with the software—arguably the very best part of Google Pixel phones. The good thing is that, at the moment, the entire Google Pixel 9 series is being discounted on the Google Store in the US. If you want to get a Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, or the bigger Pixel 9 Pro XL, you'll be saving $150 off the bat. That brings the base price of the series down to $649, which is hard to scoff at. It's almost impossible to say the base Pixel 9 isn't worth that. Image: Google For those who are bigger fans of bigger phones, the Pixel 9 Pro Fold is also being discounted. On a normal day, it'd set you back by $1,799, so $150 wouldn't make too much of a dent. That's why it is being discounted double that—$300 off brings it down to $1,499. That's more like it, especially for one of the most-improved foldables of 2024. Google Is Sending Out $100 Coupon Codes to Some YouTube Premium Subscribers Image: Talk Android Even though the entire Pixel 9 series is currently enjoying a sizable discount, Google feels like offering even more savings to some of its loyal customers. Some YouTube Premium subscribers are spotting coupon codes that knock an extra $100 off the prices of the entire Pixel 9 series. And to be clear, yes, this discount stacks with the discount that Google is offering everyone. That means you can get up to $400 off the Pixel 9 Pro Fold and $250 off the other phones in the series—that brings the Pixel 9 down to $549. That's fantastic value. Image: Google The only thing is that you need to hope that you're one of the people who has access to this deal. It's not certain what the criteria are, but you can find out if you're one of the lucky ones simply by checking your email. Through Tecno, Gionee, Vivo, Google, and now Samsung, Ayomide has always been an Android enthusiast. His current partner in crime is a Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra. You can find him playing Candy Crush or Call of Duty: Mobile, watching movies, and he is a big fan of trivia and quizzes. Previous Post
html:
Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more.

The Google Pixel 9 is almost five months old, but it is hardly old news as it remains the latest and greatest smartphone series from Google. If you're looking for a premium build, fantastic software, and some of the best cameras in the Android sector, you can essentially never go wrong with a Pixel.

At the moment, the entire Pixel 9 series is being discounted, giving you the chance to get any of the phones cheaper than usual. However, if you're a YouTube Premium subscriber in the US, you might want to check your inbox, as you might have the chance to get it for even less. That's not something to say not to if you're open to a new device.

The Google Pixel 9 Series Is Currently Being Discounted as Much as $300 on the US Google Store

The Google Pixel 9 devices are heading to be five months old, after their launch on August 22nd last year. The devices are still excellent, from the vanilla-flavored Pixel 9 all the way to the expensive and redesigned Pixel 9 Pro Fold. I'm not quite a Pixel person anymore, but if you are, I can't blame you, especially if you find yourself in love with the software—arguably the very best part of Google Pixel phones.

The good thing is that, at the moment, the entire Google Pixel 9 series is being discounted on the Google Store in the US. If you want to get a Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, or the bigger Pixel 9 Pro XL, you'll be saving $150 off the bat. That brings the base price of the series down to $649, which is hard to scoff at. It's almost impossible to say the base Pixel 9 isn't worth that.

For those who are bigger fans of bigger phones, the Pixel 9 Pro Fold is also being discounted. On a normal day, it'd set you back by $1,799, so $150 wouldn't make too much of a dent. That's why it is being discounted double that—$300 off brings it down to $1,499. That's more like it, especially for one of the most-improved foldables of 2024.

Google Is Sending Out $100 Coupon Codes to Some YouTube Premium Subscribers

Even though the entire Pixel 9 series is currently enjoying a sizable discount, Google feels like offering even more savings to some of its loyal customers. Some YouTube Premium subscribers are spotting coupon codes that knock an extra $100 off the prices of the entire Pixel 9 series. And to be clear, yes, this discount stacks with the discount that Google is offering everyone.

That means you can get up to $400 off the Pixel 9 Pro Fold and $250 off the other phones in the series—that brings the Pixel 9 down to $549. That's fantastic value.

The only thing is that you need to hope that you're one of the people who has access to this deal. It's not certain what the criteria are, but you can find out if you're one of the lucky ones simply by checking your email.

Through Tecno, Gionee, Vivo, Google, and now Samsung, Ayomide has always been an Android enthusiast. His current partner in crime is a Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra. You can find him playing Candy Crush or Call of Duty: Mobile, watching movies, and he is a big fan of trivia and quizzes.
